summary: simpler is an AI productivity app that helps users organize and prioritize tasks, allowing them to focus on what truly matters.

useCaseText: Make AI music covers with your favorite artists
summary: Voicify is an AI-powered platform that allows users to quickly generate custom songs featuring their favorite artists' styles. It is the go-to platform for music production and remixing, providing a glimpse into the future of music creation.

useCaseText: Create personalized graphic novels with text prompts.
summary: XR Books is a custom story creator. It is owned by Extended Reality Books LLC and can be contacted at info@extendedrealitybooks.com. All rights are reserved for Extended Reality Books LLC in 2023.

Jotgenius is an AI-powered content generator that helps create unique and engaging content to increase conversions and drive sales. It has over 50 templates to automate content creation, with simple pricing plans for everyone.

useCaseText: Enhanced and upscaled photos for businesses with API.
summary: Viesus is a cloud-based AI solution that enhances and upscales photos with accuracy and speed. It offers features such as a web app, API access, automated bulk image enhancements, and more. It is used by businesses of all sizes worldwide and can be tried for free.

useCaseText: Learn GPT language model via educational platform.
summary: LearnGPT is a new tool that allows users to generate fiction stories with just one click.

useCaseText: Eng. platform: exercises, tests, cards, and role-plays.
summary: Grammar AI is an AI-powered English learning platform that provides personalized learning experiences for its users. It offers a variety of exercises to help improve grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, listening and comprehension. Instant feedback is provided and the material is adjusted to the user's level. It also has a secure payment gateway and takes privacy and security seriously. There is a free trial available and users can cancel their subscription at any time.

useCaseText: Personalized virtual assistant for customer service.
summary: MagicChat is an AI assistant powered by ChatGPT Turbo and GPT-4, using advanced AI technology to deliver any AI-powered search, conversation, text completion, and other features. It can write anything from essays to poems, do math, code, and even translate complex text into simpler concepts. It has a user-friendly interface and intuitive design so you can start chatting with the chatbot in no time. MagicChat is a better and more affordable alternative to its competitors.

Gnbly is an AI executive assistant that can help you book restaurant reservations, call service providers, do phone screenings, book doctor visits and salon appointments, navigate through a phone system by pressing keys, and acquire information from businesses. It is priced to support a wide range of use cases from personal to enterprise support dispatcher. Contact them via email or their Discord server for more information and to explore investment opportunities. Try it out for only $3.

useCaseText: Personalized outreach and backlink management platform.
summary: BacklinkGPT.com is an AI-powered platform that helps users generate personalized outreach messages for link-building campaigns, monitor progress, and optimize their strategy. It utilizes Ahrefs API to find the best target backlinks and advanced AI language models to create highly personalized outreach messages tailored to the user's backlink prospect. It also provides efficient campaign management tools for organizing and managing campaigns in one place. The platform was created with the aim of providing a more efficient and effective way to manage outreach for link building.
